website_summaries.verdict: A light, high-SPF face sunscreen that also doubles as a moisturizer.
pros: Chemical-free sunscreen protects against free radicals
Doesn't leave any residue on skin
Lightweight sunscreen moisturizes as well as protects
Works well for all skin types and won't irritate sensitive skin
cons: Some do not like its watery texture

customer_reviews.title: burned
customer_reviews.text: I have fair, combination skin and bought this looking for a non-greasy physical sunblock for the face for my family. It has to be shaken very well before application, as it will otherwise separate. Sadly, however, we all burned using this product. (I've been using sunscreen daily for over 20 years and am well-versed with how to apply sunscreen and the frequency needed for reapplication.) Despite the fact that it is cosmetically elegant, blending in nicely with almost no smell and very little white sheen, I will not repurchase and cannot recommend as it doesn't do its job to protect skin from burning. I am going back to my long-time favorite Elta MD products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great...except for the little pimples it gives me
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a sunscreen with formulations for very sensitive skin with physical sunblocks. Chemical sunscreens make my face red, sensitized, and itchy. So far, I love the texture, it doesn't feel greasy, yes it does make my skin look a little white but I don't mind it since face already looks darker than my neck. I deducted three stars because it makes me break out in tiny pimples, they go away within a day or two if I stop using the sunscreen. :(
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: "GOOD PRODUCT, Just Not Fast Absorbing"
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of it when it goes on my skin and it doesn't leave a white residue on your skin, the only thing is that it doesn't absorb into the skin fast enough for me? I like to be able to apply my makeup right after applying sunscreen!
customer_reviews.author: Kaytie

customer_reviews.title: Absorbable, non greasy sun screen
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and I have to be very careful with facial products...especially sun screen. Avene Mineral Ultra-Light hydrating sunscreen has not caused any rash or itchiness on my face. I have used it for a few weeks now and have been very pleased. Usually, after an hour of using a product that I am allergic to, my face becomes red and blotchy and I sustain a terrible itch. I have not had any problems with this sunscreen. It goes on smoothly and is not greasy. It absorbs easily into my skin. I am so pleased to have a product I can finally use on my face since I have already had a squamous cell carcinoma diagnosed.
customer_reviews.author: Love the Lake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is extra light so the whitening effect on your body is minimal. It's also easy to absorb and nongreasy. It has no smell, no fragrances, natural ingredients. Highly recommended. I have sensitive skin but tolerate this well. I disagree with reviewers who criticized the whitening effect of the sunscreen. Hello-- this is made with zinc oxide! Any product with zinc will be a bit white. But this sunscreen is thinner than most. If someone doesn't want a bit of whitening, they shouldn't buy a sunscreen with zinc oxide.
customer_reviews.author: RochelleYork

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sunscreen for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sunscreen for sensitive skin! I'm incredibly fair, so daily spf is a must for me. I also have highly sensitive, reactive, breakout prone skin and finding a sunscreen that doesn't give me a horrendous chemical reaction, break me out, or give me some kind of new skin issue has been a huge challenge. This product is perfect for me! It's lightweight, gentle, and perfect for sensitive skin types. I have worn it every day for a month and have experienced no issues. Avene know what they're doing for skin types like mine, love this french skincare line.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Sun protection... great. Wearability... meh
customer_reviews.text: Four stars for sun protection. I don't burn with this on but it leaves a very slight white haze so two stars off. What's the point if I don't want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhapsody in Blue

customer_reviews.title: Has a very nice finish, not greasy or heavy or sticky feeling ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a very nice finish, not greasy or heavy or sticky feeling on the skin, , & is easy to put foundation on over it. It is more liquid than I would like, though. Rushes out of the bottle. Have to be careful not to spill, or get too much. A great concept for make-up wearers.
customer_reviews.author: MK :-)

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a white residue in my pores. I am very disappointed in this product. I thought it would be a much better product considering it was not cheap. I expected a better cream.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: High quality--but pricey sun screen.
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and are not able to tolerate a lot of sunscreens. Don't like greasy or white paint-like sunscreens. This is the best--no white paint like finish and it does not cause me a rash. However I would not use it around the eyes and it made my eyes burn for the rest of the day. I have a tendency to rub my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: pretty good, better than most for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good...I have rosacea, and I thought this was more gentle than any other sunscreen facial product I've used, but my skin still doesn't really like it because it's spf anyway. Good though, if you have to wear spf 50 on your face for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke out in hives/pimples in one try
customer_reviews.text: This is not for senisitive skin ! It broke me out super bad and I only used it once ! Thank god I didn’t use it more than once ! Your better off with cetaphil acne prone sunscreen ! Lovvvveeee ! & I have the most delicate skin & that sunscreen works pretty well and last a super long time & it’s half the price for this horrible avene sunscreen
customer_reviews.author: Shahana Aktar

customer_reviews.title: Great Suncreen for the face.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this in my face this sunscreen is a great zinc based alternative. You do have to rub it in but it is not greasy. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: ... my dermatologist sold me so I imagine it is good. Just started using it
customer_reviews.text: This is the same product my dermatologist sold me so I imagine it is good. Just started using it. It does fade into the skin which I found a problem with other cheaper products. My skin is a permanent tan color, so this is important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: The sunscreen works ok - I don't get a sunburn when I use it. However, it makes my skin feel kind of sticky, and I feel like I need to take a shower after I come indoors. It also rubs off on my clothes. Most sunscreens are like this, but I thought because it's "ultra light" it wouldn't. Like I said, it's ok, but no better than any other sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Okay--but doesn't mesh with my base makeup. Use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay--but doesn't mesh with my base makeup. Use it when I am not wearing makeup base. Not really the product's "fault"
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but excellent product. Highly recommended. Does not make my face shiny or oily and gives great protection.
customer_reviews.author: Missey M.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This sun screen is so difficult to blend. Also, it pills on skin.
customer_reviews.author: lilly sloman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's very gentle and not greasy but makes my face white
customer_reviews.author: Winston Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Best on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. Doesn't congenial or irritate the skin, even on the face. It spreads evenly and lasts a comparable length to other products without wearing off. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: paysin

customer_reviews.title: Slightly runny.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was open when I received it, but looks overall okay. It is very light, but slightly runny. Will update more as I just received it. Excellent size for a carryon bag and TSA security check.
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This works great for rosacea!! Dries quickly. Apply over morning moisturizer and before foundation. Lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to absorb into the skin and leaves the skin feeling oily. But most sunscreen are like that. The smell is tolerable and will dissipate. It didn't cause any breakouts. All in all not a bad product. Will order more.
customer_reviews.author: mylene castro

customer_reviews.title: I love this light sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love this light sunscreen! I keep it in my car and put it all over my hands and arms chest and face before driving! I don't feel greesy! I love he packaging and the entire product as well, hope to have a store one day and sell it!
customer_reviews.author: morgan garcia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, but a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen. No white residue at all and I've tried many other high end face sunscreen brands. I really love this, but you only get just over an ounce, so it's a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Summit Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: That's the best facial sun screen I have ever had. It absorbs well and feels light on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Irina W

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very light feeling once absorbed and does not appear to clog my pores or anything! Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen. Use it all over my face, neck, chest and hands. Doesn't leave a greasy film and leaves skin feeling silky.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: lightweight sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and moisturizing. Does not leave a white residue.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: I love Avene products and have used them for years
customer_reviews.text: I love Avene products and have used them for years. This product did not work for me at all--felt like a mixture of toothpaste and Vaseline, thick and greasy.
customer_reviews.author: ESMD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight lotion, but very expensive for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.author: AMO1234

customer_reviews.title: it is good for me
customer_reviews.text: Since it is not sticky, it is good for me. Usually, sunscreen is too sticky. This one has no such thing. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Hyunji Doh

customer_reviews.title: The small bottle size makes it easy to carry in your purse to reapply throughout the ...
customer_reviews.text: This sunblock is very light and has a matte finish feel so that your face is not greasy the entire day. It feels very light and has a minimal sunblock scent. The small bottle size makes it easy to carry in your purse to reapply throughout the day. I have very sensitive skin so I started breaking out after 3-4 days of using this. I can't wear it daily but I still use it on occation. I would still recommend this for those without extreme sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: My skin is sensitive and this one doesn’t upset me at all. It’s light and clean so you don’t have to worry it will give you acnes.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Z

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not suit to my skin type. Does not have high protection for California sun
customer_reviews.author: Maryna Azova

customer_reviews.title: Looked ghostly
customer_reviews.text: Didn't care for this. Only because it left a white film on my face. Maybe I used a lot but I need good sunscreen coverage. Wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaG

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not heavy on the skin at all! I ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not heavy on the skin at all! I tend to sweat immediately after applying sunscreen and with this one I don't!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Lima

customer_reviews.title: but it does provide good protection.
customer_reviews.text: A little on the expensive side, but it does provide good protection.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Banks

customer_reviews.title: Mineral only formulation better for marine life
customer_reviews.text: The performance of this sunscreen has been great so far. The mineral-only formulation is better for marine life when it goes into the water supply and this one doesn't leave a visible residue.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: First sunscreen that does not cause my skin to break out!
customer_reviews.author: D J

customer_reviews.title: Great daily sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sunscreen. I use it on my face everyday. It never feels sticky or gross - I forget I'm wearing it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is very nice. It sinks into my skin and is easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice. It sinks into my skin and is easy to apply. A bit expensive, unfortunately. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dries White in Wrinkles or Skin Folds
customer_reviews.text: Dries White in Wrinkles of Skin Folds, has to be rubbed in vigorously and this is not good for skin. It is also very runny and must be shaken vigorously before using. I will be returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: For a dewy complexion
customer_reviews.text: I really like this block, it gives my skin a dewy complexion. It does have a very slight white cast so I add Skinceuticals Matte sunblock , which has a slight tint, over the Eau Thermale Mineral........works well for my pale skin.
customer_reviews.author: dog art

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't blend in
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen never blended in fully on my skin. It left me with white smears of zinc oxide in patches all over my face. I have NO idea how it has gotten such good reviews?? Oh well, on to the next sunscreen....
customer_reviews.author: Bluemoon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing and I've tried everything from really expensive products like Creme de la Mer's sunscreen to midrange US (Skinceuticals), to UK (Ultrasun), Japanese (Anessa, Shiseido Wetforce, Biore) to Korean (Hera), and this is the best so far. Lightweight, creamy, and not sticky and your skin will be soft, soft, soft and completely protected. I was worried that the protection level wouldn't be as good because it's mineral based and lightweight but I spent time in Cambodia in the dry blistering heat and neither my face nor my arms got any hint of sun. It was fantastic and I am stocking up. Also this is a great merchant to buy from.
customer_reviews.author: Parisparfait

customer_reviews.title: Caused breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product was really lightweight and didn't leave my face white. It's actually so lightweight that I am a little skeptical that the SPF is as high as they claim. But, I stopped using it because it made my face break out really badly. If you do give it a shot, be sure to shake well since it separates a lot.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: it is that nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very fluid, no white residue, which for me was a huge selling point. I use it before moisturizer , you could also use as your moisturizer, it is that nice.
customer_reviews.author: a mom

customer_reviews.title: This is the best sunblock I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sunblock I've ever used. I live in Houston and ride my bike to and from work so have to reapply many times during the day. I have oily face prone to acne. This is the only face sunblock that hasn't caused me breakouts. It's so nice to apply too, as very moisturising but at the same time is a great base for makeup, almost like a primer as holds my foundation for hours. Great for outdoor sports, doesn't sting eyes, non-greasy, doesn't leave white marks, waterproof. All round excellent product and a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: TRM

customer_reviews.title: I do not feel like I have fully removed the residue of this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's just mine, but it has a strong chemical smell that doesn't go away. I find it very difficult to apply makeup over it due to it staying tacky on my skin. I also do not find it at all hydrating. My skin feels tight and dry all day when I use this. At night when I cleanse my face before bed, I do not feel like I have fully removed the residue of this stuff. I really wanted to love this but I am disappointed. I love other Avene products, but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lizard

customer_reviews.title: WSJ was right!  This is great sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I have used it in bright sun, and did not burn. It goes on smoothly, does not look greasy or leave white flakes on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Above the 45th

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Another great product from Avene - love this and the fact that it's got sunscreen in it.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome SPF
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I'm allergic to most SPF's and I've had no issues with this one whatsoever. Wonderful and goes on creamy smooth and blends in nicely under foundation or I even wear it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Soccer Mom

customer_reviews.title: it literally feels like you are putting oil on your face
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is way too oily if you have oily skin, it literally feels like you are putting oil on your face.
customer_reviews.author: VRM

customer_reviews.title: Great product fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: Best sunblock I have tried in a long time! I have very sensitive skin! Pro acne and this product works wonderfully on my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: great but expensive
customer_reviews.text: This has a great feel and my son likes this better than all the other broad spectrum coverage sunscreens. He's particular about the feel. But it is so ridiculously pricey that i knocked it down to 3 stars for value.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett's mom

customer_reviews.title: Not awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the way this worked on my skin. I didn't mix well with any of my moisturizers and made my makeup into balls. very unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: loosewheel

customer_reviews.title: it really makes my facial skin soft and didn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: it really makes my facial skin soft and didn't have any skin sensitivity to it unlike any other brand that I used..
customer_reviews.author: yolly heiser

customer_reviews.title: never recommended
customer_reviews.text: I had received opened and used product , never recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LA ROCHE-POSAY Anthelios 60 Ultra Light Sunscreen still remains by favorite sunscreen.
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is sticky and remains tacky on the skin even when fully absorbed, it also leaves a white residue and I have fair skin. To top it off I am out 30 bucks because it was non-returnable and non-exchangeable if item was opened. LA ROCHE-POSAY Anthelios 60 Ultra Light Sunscreen still remains by favorite sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka J.

customer_reviews.title: Total fail
customer_reviews.text: I had such high expectations for this sunscreen but it just sucked. I like a lot of Avene products and find them high-quality in general but this did not work for me at all and really will make me hesitant to purchase any Avene sunscreen in the future. Pros: -Didn't break me out or sting upon application Cons: -Huge white cast! (And I'm pretty pale) -Didn't absorb all the way -Balled up if I tried to rub it in more -Caught on any dry patches of skin I had -Could not wear any makeup over it because it would flake and just look so horrible
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

product_meta.title: Avene Mineral Ultra-Light Hydrating Sunscreen SPF 50 Plus Face Lotion, 1.3 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description:
Protect your face from environmental and UVA/UVB aging with Avene Ultra-Light Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50+. This sheer formula is water resistant up to 80 minutes, and Dermatologist tested. Safe for sensitive skin and recommended for any skin type, this sunscreen is a must have for your daily care regimen.

BRAND STORY
Rooted in dermatology and hydrotherapy, Avène has over 270 years of expertise in caring for sensitive skin and is trusted by millions. Its core ingredient, Avène Thermal Spring Water, soothes and helps minimize skin sensitivity.
